titles.title: Celebrating the goals and ideals of 20th anniversary of The Society of Thoracic Surgeons National Database.
Celebrating the goals and ideals of 20th anniversary of The Society of Thoracic Surgeons National Database.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Celebrates the goals and ideals of the 20th anniversary of the Society of Thoracic Surgeons National Database.
Applauds the use of data from that Database to provide the most efficient and appropriate medical care.
Recognizes the need to promote the creation of additional clinical databases in medicine.
Commends cardiothoracic surgeons for demonstrating their dedication to professional responsibility and the highest level of patient care by continued use of such Database.
